E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1984
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
I think it is time to leave the show. This will
probably be my last year. Just wanted to let you know!

Regards,
Nick Saez



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Edward Walborn
Dear Sir,
Edward Walborn has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .290 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of John Nazario
Dear Sir,
John Nazario is hitting the ball well at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .278, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Carlos Bañuelos
Dear Sir,
Carlos Bañuelos has nothing more to prove at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an AVG of .316 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/14/1984
Subject: Harold Cantara healing process
Harold Cantara is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1984
Subject: Bret Thomas healing process
Bret Thomas is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1984
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Max Amezcua



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1984
Subject: Edward Walborn learns new position
Edward Walborn has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 6/7/1984
Subject: Status of Jared Bowley
Dear Sir,
Jared Bowley isn't hitting the ball at all at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .249, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 6/21/1984
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Thomas Pinkham
